DESCRIPTION_EXTENSION: Improve experience on Disney plus web application.
SHOW_TRAILERS_AT_THE_TOP_OF_THE_PAGE_ON_: Show trailers at the top of the page on the home page.
SHOW_THE_TRAILER_AT_THE_TOP_OF_THE_MOVIE: Show the trailer at the top of the movie page.
ENABLE_FULLSCREEN_WHEN_DOUBLE_CLICK_ON_A: Enable fullscreen when double click on a movie.
SUBJECT: Subject
FULLNAME_IS_A_REQUIRED_FIELD: Full Name is a required field
EMAIL_MUST_BE_A_VALID_EMAIL: Email must be a valid email
THANK_YOU_MESSAGE_RECEIVED_I_WILL_DO_MY_: Thank you, I received your message. I will do my best to answer as soon as possible.
THE_MESSAGE_IS_TEMPORARILY_UNABLE_TO_BE_: The message is temporarily unable to be sent.
